::Zardus/Mosquitor::

"Hold your fire," Zardus says, approaching the last femm. He looks down at her, his scanners working hard, but then some of Mosquitor's acid splatters on his shoulder. The mosquito'd obviously not heard Zardus. Growling, the Alliance commander turns and brings up his rifle, firing four bolts at Mosquitor's shoulder. They all hit, the bug's arm falling off, the gun clattering to the ground as well.

"Now then," Zardus says, looking back at the femm, "Wheeljack, can you see how damaged they are?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mosquitor bends down after his arm falls off, buzzing furiously and picking it up.
